pr_title: FEATURE: per-topic unsubscribe option in emails

comments_summary.summary: XSS via triple-stash claim - invalid because fancy_title is HTML-escaped server-side
TopicUser nil bug - valid, tu.notification_level will crash when TopicUser record doesn't exist
Typo in property name - not a bug since typo is consistent across files
Correctly identifies TopicUser nil bug but lacks file/line specificity
Not a functional bug - typo is consistent. Also incorrectly describes the typo.

validation_notes: Only 1 real bug exists in this PR: TopicUser can be nil in unsubscribe action
Both droid and golden correctly identified the TopicUser nil bug
The XSS concern raised by droid is a false positive due to server-side HTML escaping
The typo issue raised by both is not a functional bug since the misspelling is consistent
Droid comment about current_user being nil is incorrect - unsubscribe action has ensure_logged_in filter
